about_the_game:
About the game

Far from earth, exists a world full of clowns hiding their true-selves inside the masks. Delve into the mystical and corrupted world of clowns, in this action packed Metroidvania, Peaky Circus.

The Game follows “The mime” who came back to “the white face town” after decades to find out the murderer of his dad and to take revenge. Fight these creatures covering behind the mask, make a lot of new friends and seek the mysteries of the town around you.

Key Features


  • A beautiful Hand-crafted platformer with a pinch of spookiness
  • Heavily focused on exploration
  • Snappy and tight controls
  • Interconnected world with a rich lore
  • Along with the main gameplay, play mini games, perform on stage, complete side missions
  • A deep and compelling story

short_description: When The Mime was a kid, his dad and most of his community was killed in a war but luckily his uncle helped him and his mother to escape the town. The mime was hiding in the woods and The Uncle helped them with the food and other essentials, mime is now ready to fight with the murderer of his dad.
